question: How can I access my account?
answer: Enter the more section of the app. From here click on your name at the top of the screen. From there you'll be able to edit your profile picture and your name.

question: Do I need to make an account from scratch?
answer: No, you will be able to sign in using your Facebook account. However, if you don't want to use Facebook you can sign in using your username and Passenger.

question: Is there a way for me to see how many points I have on the website?
answer: At this moment, the only way to access your information is on the mobile app itself.

question: As a business, how do we sign up to have an account and offer discounts on Passenger?
answer: To sign up for a merchant account on Passenger, go to the merchants section of the website and click get started. Once you are there fill out the form and we will get back to you within 24 hours of your submission..
